## Classes

### <a name="mcelog"></a>`mcelog`

Manage mcelog

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include ::mcelog
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `mcelog` class:

* [`ensure`](#-mcelog--ensure)
* [`settings`](#-mcelog--settings)
* [`service_ensure`](#-mcelog--service_ensure)

##### <a name="-mcelog--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present','absent']`

Defines state of mcelog. Setting to `absent` will completely remove mcelog

Default value: `'present'`

##### <a name="-mcelog--settings"></a>`settings`

Data type: `Hash`

Settings hash to be passed to `mcelog.conf` INI file.
Keys are the section in `mcelog.log` and empty key is global settings
The values are key/value pairs of setting and value under a given section.

Default value: `{}`

##### <a name="-mcelog--service_ensure"></a>`service_ensure`

Data type: `Optional[Enum['running','stopped']]`

Service `ensure` value.  Default is based on `ensure` parameter value.

Default value: `undef`
